title: Qwerty Learner
detail: Combines the memorisation of English words with the exercise of muscle memory for English keyboard input, allowing you to consolidate muscle memory while reciting words.

title: Here is the Resume!
detail: Now it is latest and available. Click the "Download CV" at bottom-left corner to download my Simplified Chinese resume and know me now!

title: pinch-challenge
detail: It help ye download "Daily Challenge" of Leecode efficiently. After the installation of python, put the programme where you want it and run it.

title: First Installation of Arch Linux
detail: How awful is a noob who don't know anything about Linux? Telling the most stupid mistakes I have made.

title: How to Cook
detail: A very theoretical guidance for programmers to know how to cook at home (Chinese only).

title: Typora-pinch-theme
detail: A sky-blue theme for typora, for self-use, and offering testing and sharing. Download the latest theme file from the url and extract it to your theme folder.
